description: This tool collects and processes mobile network data either by uploading a CDR file or using a CDR generator for network analysis and monitoring.
target_description: Collects data directly from uploaded CDR records or from CDR generator without specific target URLs.
name: Mobile Network Data Collector
scope: Collects and analyzes mobile network communications data for art crime.
tool_author_info: Developed by BEIA for use in network analysis and performance monitoring
